<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Redeem a Chimoney as a gift card"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/redeem/gift-card"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Redeems a Chimoney transaction into a gift card.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"email":{"type":"string","format":"email"},"countryCode":{"type":"string","description":"ISO 2-letter country code"},"productId":{"type":"string","description":"Gift card product/key"},"chiRef":{"type":"string","description":"Chimoney transaction reference (issueID)"}},"required":["email","countryCode","productId","chiRef"]},"example":{"email":"recipient@example.com","countryCode":"US","productId":"amazon","chiRef":"iss_abc123"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Gift card redemption successful","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":true},"example":{"status":"success","redemptionRef":"redeem_123","productId":"amazon","countryCode":"US"}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ErrorResponse"},"example":{"status":"error","message":"Invalid valueInUSD"}}}},"401":{"description":"Missing or invalid API key","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ErrorResponse"},"example":{"status":"error","message":"Unauthorized"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
